EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-12-06
EmailTemplate.subject: How Software Innovation and Agility Brought Thales to New Heights
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
December 6, 2018 <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/thales?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=pivotal-thales-promo&utm_campaign=pivotal-thales-q418]]> How Software Innovation and Agility Brought Thales to New Heights Thales is committed to providing innovative solutions to their customers. With the help of Pivotal and Microsoft Azure, they continue to grow as a global leader in aerospace, space, defense, ground transportation, and security. Watch Their Story <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/thales?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=pivotal-thales-promo&utm_campaign=pivotal-thales-q418]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/you-re-investing-in-net-and-so-are-we-pivotal-is-now-a-corporate-sponsor-of-the-net-foundation?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_content=1543941669&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Is Now a Corporate Sponsor of The .NET Foundation You’re investing in .NET, and so are we. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/you-re-investing-in-net-and-so-are-we-pivotal-is-now-a-corporate-sponsor-of-the-net-foundation?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_content=1543941669&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://www.cio.com/article/3322525/cio-role/what-it-takes-to-be-a-true-transformational-cio.html> CIO Magazine: What It Takes To Be a True Transformational CIO The CIO role has undergone significant change as organizations transition into digital enterprises. Here’s how to move beyond being an operational leader. Take A Closer Look <[[https://www.cio.com/article/3322525/cio-role/what-it-takes-to-be-a-true-transformational-cio.html]]> <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/questionnaire?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/digital-transformation-requires-development-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Digital Transformation Requires Development Transformation Built in Seattle takes a look and tour of our new Seattle office. Read the Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/digital-transformation-requires-development-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/domain-driven-design-event-storming-with-jakub-pilimon?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Domain-Driven Design & Event Storming, with Jakub Pilimon In this episode, Coté talks with Jakub Pilimon to figure out what DDD is, and dives deep into why event storming is used to find domains. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/domain-driven-design-event-storming-with-jakub-pilimon?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://survey.developereconomics.com/surveys/de16?utm_source=ZLvi9rlT&utm_medium=partner> Developer Economics Survey Q4 2018 Share your opinions about platforms, languages, frameworks, resources, and more! Find out what’s new in the software industry and where it’s going next. Take the Survey <[[https://survey.developereconomics.com/surveys/de16?utm_source=ZLvi9rlT&utm_medium=partner]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/this-month-in-spring-december-2-2019?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> This Month in Spring Josh Long breaks down the latest and greatest this month in Spring.
